name: AssociateAutomationActionWithTeam
description:
Associate an Automation Action with a team.

Use this tool to link a specific automation action to a designated team in PagerDuty. It should be called when there's a need to establish or update the association between an existing action and a team.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the resource to be associated with a team.

parameters.name: response_format_version
parameters.description: Specifies the API version to use for response formatting. It is sent in the `Accept` header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the media type of the resource, should always be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: team_association_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing the team data required to associate an automation action with a team. This must include all necessary team identifiers and attributes.
